Cenrail to University, come in University

Aster Cometwing • April 22, 2025

Last updated: 13 January 2025, 19:40 RST

Elemental City has become more connected. With help from the Kingdom of Kyaw Cen's Lux Moniridia and Fin of Eras, the Cenrail's Ŋafrican line has been extended into northern Elemental City near the Stellar Arena. The station allows university-goers to quickly reach Seven Territory or Maryland for extracurricular activities.
